extensionDescription.message: Fluentify allows you to easily add "ChatGPT" to any webpage. With a click, you can get answers without endless chatting.

I_want_to_recommend_an_open_source_Chrom.message:
I want to recommend an open-source Chrome extension called Fluentify.
With no prior knowledge, you can create a custom AI in just seconds to handle tasks, such as writing articles, code, and weekly reports.
Download it at: www.fluentify.io

Like_Fluentify__Recommend_it_to_your_fri.message: Like Fluentify? Recommend it to your friend!

Please_select_any_text_on_the_webpage_fi.message: Please select any text on the webpage first

Auth_key_not_available__please_reset.message: Auth key not available, please reset

Summarize_and_express_these_words_concis.message: Summarize and express these words concisely

Retouch_text__review_and_revise_problems.message: Retouch text, review and revise problems in spelling, grammar, punctuation, word usage, and sentence structure

Identify_any_logical_or_factual_errors_i.message: Identify any logical or factual errors in these texts and provide a rebuttal. At the same time, present the opposite viewpoint with supporting evidence

About_to_clear_the_auth_key_and_restore_.message: About to clear the auth key and restore all preset functions

What_do_you_want_to_do_with_the_selected.message: What do you want to do with the selected text?

Instructions_1__Select_some_text_on_a_we.message:
Instructions
1. Select some text on a webpage

2__Enter_a_command_in_the_input_box_abov.message: 2. Enter a command in the input box above and click the Confirm button
